common.WS_NOT_CONNECTED_WARNING: Failed to connect to auto refresh. Retrying...
common.CHOOSE_SERVER: Please choose a city to start
common.ABOUT_COOPCYCLE:
Unlike big platforms, with CoopCycle the implementation of a food delivery service is at the initiative of bike messengers, who decide to form a co-op at the local scale. 

If your city is not listed, it means that there is no project (yet). 

If you are a group of bike messengers, contact us to find out how we can help you to set up your project as a co-op.
common.SERVER_URL: Your server is not listed? Enter its address
common.NAME: Name
common.SEARCH_NEARBY: Search nearby, browse menus, place your order
common.WELCOME_TEXT:
Thank you for downloading CoopCycle. 
To start using the application, connect to a server.
common.NO_RESTAURANTS: Sorry, we could not find any open restaurants
common.SEARCH_WITHOUT_DATE: Do you want to restart the search without including a date
common.SWIPE_TO_END: Swipe right to end task, or to the left if there is a problem
common.RESET_PASSWORD_CHECK_EMAIL_DISCLAIMER: An email has been sent to {{email}}. It contains a link you must click to reset your password.
common.RESET_PASSWORD_LINK_EXPIRED: Link has expired, try to reset password again
common.EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED: This e-mail has already been registered
common.INVALID_GIVEN_NAME: Please enter a valid first name
common.INVALID_FAMILY_NAME: Please enter a valid last name
common.INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER: Please enter a valid phone number
common.INVALID_USERNAME_FORMAT: A username can only contain alphanumeric characters (letters A-Z, numbers 0-9) with the exception of underscores
common.INVALID_PASSWORD: Please enter a valid password at least 8 characters
common.RESTAURANT_LIST_CLICK_BELOW: Click on a restaurant in the list below
common.RESTAURANT_ORDER_REFUSE_DISCLAIMER: Please tell us why you want to decline this order so that we can inform the customer
common.RESTAURANT_ORDER_REFUSE_REASON_ORDER_CON: You will continue receiving new orders
common.RESTAURANT_ORDER_REFUSE_REASON_ORDER_STO: You will not receive orders anymore
common.RESTAURANT_ORDER_REFUSE_REASON_ORDER_WIL: The order will be cancelled, but won't be refunded to customer
common.RESTAURANT_CLOSE_ALERT_MESSAGE: This will close your restaurant for today
common.RESTAURANT_ORDER_DELAY_DISCLAIMER: How much delay would you like to apply?
common.RESTAURANT_ORDER_CANCEL_DISCLAIMER: Please tell us why you want to cancel this order
common.RESTAURANT_SOUND_ALERT_MESSAGE: The sound volume is quite low. You should increase it to make sure you hear notifications.
common.CHECKOUT_ADDRESS_NOT_VALID: Sorry, we don't deliver at this address
common.CHECKOUT_ORDER_PHONE_NUMBER_HELP: To contact you if there's a problem
common.CHECKOUT_ORDER_NOTES: A message for the restaurant owner ?
common.CHECKOUT_ORDER_NOTES_HELP: This message will be transmitted to the cook (allergies, special requests)
common.CHECKOUT_PICK_DATE: This store is closed for the moment, but you can schedule an order for later.
common.NOTIFICATION_TASKS_CHANGED_DESC: Your tasks from {{date}} have been updated, {{added}}
common.NOTIFICATION_ORDER_CREATED_DESC: A new order for {{date}} has been created
common.NOTIFICATION_CLOSES_SOON: Hop hop hop ! Hurry up, it remains {{diff}} until closing !
common.ORDER_NEW_HELP: The restaurant has to confirm your order
common.ADDRESS_NOT_PRECISE_ENOUGH: This address is not precise enough
common.REGISTER_CHECK_EMAIL_DISCLAIMER: An email has been sent to {{email}}. It contains an activation link you must click to activate your account.
common.REGISTER_CHECK_EMAIL_ALREADY_ACTIVATED: You have already activated your account?
common.STORE_NEW_DELIVERY_ADDRESS_HELP: Enter dropoff address to verify feasibility

STORE_NEW_DELIVERY_ERROR.EMPTY_CONTACT_NAME: Please provide a name for the recipient

common.SWIPE_TO_ACCEPT_REFUSE: Slide to the right to accept, to the left to refuse
common.TASK_COMPLETE_ALERT_MESSAGE: Do you want to start, or complete this task?
common.CART_COLLECTION_DISCLAIMER:
You have opted for click&collect. 
You are responsible for collecting your order on the day and time selected. 
If you have a problem, contact the establishment at {{telephone}}. 
Please note - If you do not collect, you will be charged the full amount for the order.

BACKGROUND_PERMISSION_DISCLOSURE.title: Use your location
BACKGROUND_PERMISSION_DISCLOSURE.message:
To allow dispatchers to assign jobs accurately, allow CoopCycle to access this device's location even when the app is closed or not in use.

This data will be uploaded to the CoopCycle instance you are connected to.

BACKGROUND_PERMISSION_RATIONALE.title: Allow {applicationName} to access this device's location even when the app is closed or not in use
BACKGROUND_PERMISSION_RATIONALE.message: When authenticated as a messenger, this app collects location data to allow dispatchers to assign jobs accurately

common.CASH_ON_DELIVERY_DISCLAIMER: You are going to pay by cash on delivery. Please prepare the exact amount and make sure to be reachable.
common.RESTAURANT_CLOSED_BUT_OPENS: This restaurant is closed now but opens {{ datetime }}. You can still order for later on though!
common.RESTAURANT_CLOSED_AND_NOT_AVAILABLE: This restaurant is closed and not available until {{ datetime }}.
common.GUEST_CHECKOUT_ORDER_EMAIL_HELP: To send you updates about your order
common.GUEST_CHECK_EMAIL_FOR_ORDER_UPDATES: Because you chose to checkout as guest, please check your emails to follow your order
common.MULTIPLE_SERVERS_IN_SAME_CITY_MODAL_TEXT: There are more than one cooperative in your city, you can navigate between them using the tabs or by swiping left or right.
common.EMPTY_CARTS_TITLE: Add items to start a cart
common.EMPTY_CARTS_SUBTITLE: Once you add items from a restaurant or store, your cart will appear here.
common.SOME_OPTION_IS_REQUIRED_SELECT_ONE_VALUE: There are mandatory options, select a value from them to continue
common.ASK_ADDRESS_DISCLAIMER: We use your address to help you find the best businesses nearby
common.ORDER_TIMELINE_REFUSED_DESCRIPTION: Your order cannot be prepared by the restaurant
common.ORDER_TIMELINE_AFTER_ACCEPTED_TITLE: The restaurant now needs to prepare your order
common.ORDER_TIMELINE_AFTER_ACCEPTED_DESCRIPTIO: We will keep you updated when the courier picks your order
common.ORDER_TIMELINE_AFTER_CREATED_DESCRIPTION: The restaurant has to confirm your order. In case of refusal no amount will be debited from your card
common.LEGAL_TEXTS_LABEL: I accept the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy
common.LEGAL_TEXTS_ERROR_MESSAGE: You must accept the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
common.TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS_LABEL: I accept the Terms and Conditions
common.TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS_ERROR_MESSAGE: You must accept the Terms and Conditions
common.PRIVACY_POLICY_ERROR_MESSAGE: You must accept the Privacy Policy
common.DELETE_ACCOUNT_DISCLAIMER: By clicking the button below, you are going to delete your account. Are you sure?
common.SEARCH_WITHOUT_RESULTS: No results found. Please try again with another search.
common.PAY_WITH_SAVED_CREDIT_CARD: Pay with a saved credit card
common.SELECT_SAVED_CARD_ERROR: Please select or add a credit card to pay
common.INVALID_CREDIT_CARD_ERROR: Please enter a valid credit card information
common.INVALID_CARD_HOLDER_NAME_ERROR: Please enter a valid card holder name
common.APPLE_SIGN_IN_HIDE_MY_EMAIL_ERROR: Sorry, we canʼt authenticate your account if you choose to hide your email
common.SOCIAL_SIGN_IN_UNKNOWN_EMAIL: Sorry, we couldnʼt find an account matching the e-mail associated with your {{provider}} account.
common.CHECKOUT_LOOPEAT_VALIDATE: Validate and go back to cart
common.RESTAURANT_LOOPEAT_DISCLAIMER: Change the number of containers used to pack the order
common.SESSION_ERROR_TRY_AGAIN: An error occurred with the session, please login and try again.
common.CHECKOUT_LOOPEAT_CONNECT_ACCOUNT_TEXT: Connect your {{name}} account to continue, or disable the zero waste option
common.CART_ZERO_WASTE_POPUP_TEXT: Congratulations, your cart contains a dish eligible for zero-waste delivery with our partner « {{name}} ». Have it delivered in returnable boxes and return your boxes anywhere in the « {{name}} » network or to your courier with your next order. You can disable this option at any time.
